title: 关于1.12刷怪笼无法出怪的问题
author: 星空w
txt_content:
最近在研究刷怪笼的nbt。尝试做了一个后发现完全刷不出来怪。。
/give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{id:"MobSpawner",SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:sheep",IsBaby:1b,Age:-2147483648,IsBaby:1b},SpawnCount:1,SpawnRange:5,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6}}复制代码
指令在这。哪位dalao来解释一下..

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
这种一次性的，还是用setblock吧
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnCount:1,SpawnRange:5,RequiredPlayerRange:30,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:300,MaxSpawnDelay:1800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:sheep",Age:-2147483648,IsBaby:1b}}复制代码

replies.author: 星空w
replies.txt_content:
free8605 发表于 2017-7-8 19:58
这种一次性的，还是用setblock吧
没区别啊。。
